title: Ep 239 | Phil Robertson's New Boycott, the Secret to Good Coffee, and Jase Finds Freedom in Florida
description:
Phil is done with news and sports. With more time for TV Westerns, he realizes how many of them are fueled by one essential ingredient: coffee. He shares the secret that revolutionized how he makes coffee, and it's got nothing to do with coffee beans or water. Jase heads to an event in Florida, finds a packed venue, and talks to a 10-year-old cancer survivor he prayed for five years ago. Jase also experiences another travel mishap, but this time, his shirt saves the day.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
